translations: adj.象形文字的，绘画文字的

phrs.translation: 象形, 象形文字的, 绘画文字的, 的中文意思
象形字, 六书之一, 象形文字
图画文字, 象形文字, 表形文字

sentences.sentence: Some of the earliest written Chinese characters were quite pictographic.//
sentences.translation: 一些最古老的文字属象形文字。

sentences.sentence: This feature, known as synecdoche, is common in the known pictographic languages.
sentences.translation: 这种特色的表达就是人们所知的提喻，它通常在已知的象形文字语言中出现。

sentences.sentence: These instructions are a pictographic representation of the least imaginative way to assemble these components.
sentences.translation: 这些说明书用都是些图解，用最没有想象力旳方式组合旳这些零件。
